text:
THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
Novice G, Fawcett, President
COLUMBUS 10
COLLEGE OF EDUCATION
Bureau of Educational Research
Mr. Roberts. Underwood
NAEB Tape Network
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Underwood:
July 25, 1958
naeb head:,, A«r£Rs
Jr.
^9 1958
I have just chatted with Mr. Donald Quale, program
director of WOSU, about doing that series of quarter
hour programs dealing with the Newsletter. I hope
to have this done by the first of October and
Mr. Quale informs me that WOSU will run them
first. He also indicated that for the Network you
usually wanted to see a program in the middle of
the series.
f
So I will do the series and then I will submit them to
you for possible distribution through the Network.
Sincerely
ED/bc
